column4: Can someone please tell me how to change the password on the wireless keyring so that I can change it to my new password and not my old one?
go to the terminal and run the program 'seahorse'
Open the "Passwords: default" keyring, then double-click the entry for "Network secret for ____". You should see a toggle for "Password" where you can change it.
Sorry, i don't think there's a way to display real name instead of your username on the taskbar. See this wishlist on Launchpad: https://bugs.launchpad.net/indicator-applet/+bug/475443
